lyrics.text: Lesson 85 Never too old to learn. First listen and then answer the question.
lyrics.translation: 第85课 活到老，学到老。先听录音，然后回答问题。

lyrics.text: How long has Mr. Page been teaching? I have just received a letter from my old
lyrics.translation: 帕奇先生教书多久了？我刚刚收到了一封来自我的老

lyrics.text: school informing me that my former headmaster, Mr. Stewart Page, will be retiring next week.
lyrics.translation: 学校通知我，我的前校长，斯图尔特·佩奇先生，将于下周退休。

lyrics.text: Pupils of the school, old and new, will be sending him a present to mark the occasion.
lyrics.translation: 学校的学生，无论新老，都将送给他一份礼物以纪念这个场合。

lyrics.text: All those who have contributed towards the gift will sign their names in a large album which will
lyrics.translation: 所有为这份礼物做出贡献的人都会在一个大型纪念册上签名，这个纪念册将

lyrics.text: be sent to the headmaster's home. We shall all remember Mr. Page for his patience and understanding
lyrics.translation: 被送到校长的家里。我们都会记住佩奇先生的耐心和理解。

lyrics.text: and for the kindly encouragement he gave us when we went so unwillingly to school.
lyrics.translation: 以及在我们极不情愿地去学校时，他给予我们的亲切鼓励。

lyrics.text: A great many former pupils will be attending a farewell dinner in his honor next Thursday.
lyrics.translation: 许多以前的学生将在下周四参加为他举行的告别宴会。

lyrics.text: It is a curious coincidence that the day before his retirement, Mr. Page will have been teaching
lyrics.translation: 这是一个奇怪的巧合，帕奇先生在退休前一天还在教书

lyrics.text: for a total of 40 years. After he has retired, he will devote himself to gardening. For him,
lyrics.translation: 总共40年。退休后，他将投身于园艺工作。对他来说，

lyrics.text: this will be an entirely new hobby. But this does not matter, for as he has often remarked,
lyrics.translation: 这将是一个全新的爱好。但这并不重要，正如他经常提到的，

lyrics.text: one is never too old to learn.
